title: The Adventure Zone: Dust - Episode 1
description: The Graysons set out to solve a murder in the streets of Dry River before sunrise. Augustus pulls some spectral pranks. Errol follows his nose. Gandy meets Death.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
